mapper.insert: INSERT INTO physical_cluster (id, name, kubeconfig_base64_encrypted, status, total_gpu_slots, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{kubeconfigBase64Encrypted}, #{status}, #{totalGpuSlots}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE physical_cluster SET name = #{name}, kubeconfig_base64_encrypted = #{kubeconfigBase64Encrypted}, status = #{status}, total_gpu_slots = #{totalGpuSlots}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM physical_cluster ORDER BY created_at DESC
